content: उपचित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Collected, gathered together, accumulated; अस्रैरुपचितैः <ls>Me. 105.</ls> {@--2@} Increased, grown; <ls>U. 6. 28</ls>; <ls>R. 9. 27</ls>; °अवयवा मंजरी <ls n="R.">9. 44</ls> full-grown. {@--3@} Grown in power, strengthened; <ls>Śi. 6. 63</ls>; <ls>R. 17. 54</ls>; °महामोहगहनः <ls>Māl. 1. 30</ls>; °वपुः <ls>Me. 32</ls>; लोकप्रसिद्धिः उपचिता <ls>Mu. 2</ls> the popular idea was strengthened. {@--4@} Full of, abounding in, covered over with; <ls>R. 9. 53</ls>; वियदुपचितमेघं <ls>Bh. 1. 35.</ls> {@--5@} Abundantly furnished with, plastered, smeared.
